description: This lush, fruity drink is as fresh and pure-minded as an ocean breeze while being bold enough to take on all sorts of flavors. Mezcal lime juice meets sweet agave for a perfect partnership in this&nbsp;mojito style cocktail that's heavy handed with mint making it supremely revitalizing!
name: Strawberry Mezcal Mojito
recipeIngredient: More strawberries and a sprig of mint for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Muddle mint, strawberry, lime juice, and agave in a cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Muddle mint, strawberry, lime juice, and agave in a cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Add mezcal and ice. Shake until well-combined and chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the mixture into a glass. Top off with a splash of seltzer.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a sprig of mint and a sliced fresh strawberry.
